reported_cause_of_death: Hit on head w/h hammer on athletic field
Fell to his death from a freight train while running away and heading home to the Navajo Reservation in Arizona in 1921.(Another explanation: Exposure, found on train unconscious)
He died after he was struck in the head by a 12-pound shot thrown by a shot-putter.
source: Los Angeles Times 2/23/2003, Riverside Daily Press 3/22/1926

reported_cause_of_death: Blood poisoning superinduced by abcess in throat
